problem_text_cn: 如图所示,在△ABC中,AB=AC,M,N分别是AB,AC的中点,D,E为BC上的点,连接DN、EM,若AB=5cm,BC=8cm,DE=4cm,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, M and N are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively, D and E are vertices on BC, connecting DN and EM, if AB = N_0, BC = N_1, DE = N_2, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:连接MN,作AF⊥BC于F．∵AB=AC,∴BF=CF=\frac{1}{2}BC=\frac{1}{2}×8=4,在Rt△ABF中,AF=√{AB²-BF²}=√{5²-4²}=3,∵M、N分别是AB,AC的中点,∴MN是中位线,即平分三角形的高且MN=8÷2=4,∴NM=\frac{1}{2}BC=DE,∴△MNO≌△EDO,O也是ME,ND的中点,∴阴影三角形的高是\frac{1}{2}AF÷2=1.5÷2=0.75,∴S阴影=4×0.75÷2=1.5．
